src/lib/components/Bubble.jsx.description: Bubble component using d3 and hooks

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.

clicked.description: Clicked datum (use in point click callbacks)

src/lib/components/WordCloud.jsx.description: WordCloud component using d3 and hooks

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.

selected.description:
Array containing selected items
Defaults to empty array

defaultValue.value:
{
    padding: 5,
    fillRegular: 'black',
    fillHover: 'gray',
    fillSelected: 'red',
    fontFamily: 'Cera Pro, Noto Sans',
    fontSizeMin: 16,
    fontSizeMax: 40,
    fontSizeScale: 'linear', // log or sqrt
    transitionDuration: 500,
}
